name: Keep it Alive (Krystal Studio)
description:
You must avoid obstacles and traps to survive until you reach the goal.

This game was made in Construct3 simulating Pseudo 3D techniques (It's not 3D)

Stage 1 Music

Sunlight by Lightblow
From freemusicarchive-org

Stage 2 Music

The Disgraced Shrine by Mid-Air Machine
From https://freemusicarchive-org

Sounds
Taken from https://freesound.org

All the others things was maded by me
